UAW President Dennis Williams: @UAW has been about 2 things: workers' rights to organize and collectively bargain & social movement
UAW Prez: #Mexico would be great trading partner IF--free unions, raised standard of living, companies stop exploiting Mexican people.

UAW President Dennis Williams: Two big issues for UAW members were trade, immigration. Membership is "very thoughtful" about issues.
